title: Girl Cop
description: She’s a girl and she’s a cop, putting criminals behind bars just in time for Homecoming.
quote: If my sergeant finds out, he’ll take my badge and my learner’s permit.
altHero: Ben Glenroy as Bruce, back to back with Marie Phillips as Girl Cop, both holding up Charlie’s Angels finger guns
alt1: Bruce with frosted tips, crouching and talking with Girl Cop at a loading dock
